definition: to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]

sentences.english: Israel says it killed at least 20 guerillas in the battle.
sentences.chinese: 以色列说，以军在战斗中至少打死20名游击队员。

sentences.english: The scooters were part of the cargo confiscated by Israeli troops from the Gaza-bound flotilla that sailed from Turkey.
sentences.chinese: 这些滑板车是以军收缴来自土耳其船只货物的一部分。

sentences.english: Army in the attacks on the Gaza Strip after several rounds of air strikes.
sentences.chinese: 以军在袭击事件后对加沙地带发动数轮空袭行动。

sentences.english: "They fired a shell into the upstairs floor and it started a fire, " said Salah.
sentences.chinese: 以军向二楼发射了一枚炮弹，引起火灾。

sentences.english: Israel initially claimed that it was not using white phosphorus.
sentences.chinese: 以军最初声称他们并没有使用白磷弹。

sentences.english: We buried the general with full military honours.
sentences.chinese: 我们以军葬礼埋了这位将军。

sentences.english: Their troop is famous for its neat carriage.
sentences.chinese: 他们这个部队向来以军风严整著称。

sentences.english: Flares fired by Israeli forces light up the sky above the northern Gaza Strip.
sentences.chinese: 以军发射的照明弹照亮了北部加沙地带的夜空。
